title: Nocturnal Depression - Near To The Stars  MP3 320k  ak2014
description:
Nocturnal Depression - Near To The Stars  MP3 320k  ak2014 What we got...Nocturnal Depression is a band French of black metal , created in 2004 by Herr Suizid (bass, guitar, drums) and Lord Lokhraed (voice). The band features combine elements of black metal music with elements of noise , ambient and doom metal .

Index

    1 Biography
    2 Music Feature
    3 Influences
    
Biography

Nocturnal Depression founded in 2004 where it immediately publishes two demos: Suicidal thoughts and Near to the Stars . The following year releases two demos: Soundtrack for a Suicide and Fuck Off Parisian Black Metal Scene , all with the label Whispering Night Productions . Already in 2006, released their first full-length album Nostalgia - Fragments of a Broken Past . After this release, pull out a split album under the name Nocturnal Depression / Funeral RIP ; and finally, a new demo with Self-Released and Eisiger Mond Productions stamps entitled Four Seasons to a Depression . The last two albums ( Nostalgia - Fragments of a Broken Past and Four Seasons to a Depression ), were modified to be officially released on September 21, 2006 Both discs containing video songs titled Nostalgia and Host.. Finally in 2007, the band released their second album called Soundtrack for a Suicide - Opus II , under the Sun and Moon Records label. After the success of his previous productions, the band publishes a split album with the band formed in Germany Wedard later comes out with a new job Benighted In Sodom bands and Deathrow Dismal Empirean entitled Solitude; and to close 2009 Nocturnal Depression takes its first DVD called Mankind Suffering Visions is one of the live performances of the band performing many of his most successful songs throughout his career, in addition to the official music videos for the songs "Nostalgia" and "Host". In 2010 the band released a new split album together with the Kaiserreich band; besides their fourth album called The Cult Of Negation which was limited to 180 copies.

Funny thing about this band is that Herr Suizid, plays all the instruments, but when playing at concerts, Herr Suizid not participate in these due to personal reasons. This sounds like perfect music for Black Depression. Get it........
